Articles.Content:
This game is somewhat simple. The idea is that one player says something normal about a (imaginary) building, and the next person says something ridiculous about it to finish the sentence, then starts a new building.

RULES: 1. All the normal rules. 2. The building may be any kind of building or structure, but not the same type three times in a row. 3. It has to be a building/structure, it cannot be something like a tree or a shovel. 4. Make sure your reply is ridiculous, and make sure to start a new building as well.

EXAMPLE: Poster 1:"The building is a bakery..." Poster 2:"...That is five kilometers high and only sells products made entirely of mold"

I'll start:

The building is a sixty story hotel with a........

Edited November 2, 2016 by astrokerb

single one person bathroom.

The building is a shopping mall which...

Edited January 18, 2016 by Guest

only allows parking for tricycles.

The building is a tent that...

...has 10 stories, equipped with king-beds, bathrooms, etc, and even a spa and a rotating restaurant.

The building is a university campus...

...for dogs.

The building is a prison which...

...has no locked doors and allows the prisoners to have helicopters.

The building is a waste water cleaning plant...

Edited January 18, 2016 by astrokerb

That can clean all the water in the world at once!

The building is a restaurant...

that only serves meals made of metal.

The building is a house...

...with one small room.

The building is a 600 meter radio mast...

...which has a giant, evil laser on top pointed towards space.

The building is an airport...

Which is equipped with SAMs that fire on ANY approaching aircraft. 

The building is a school...

...OF ROCK! Where they provide a solid educational foundation to rocks.

The new building is an aircraft assembly plant...

...which makes them out of duct tape.

The building is an Apple store...

...that sells bananas.

The new building is a port-a potty...

...that never gets cleaned.

 

The replacement building looks like the Hill in the "King of the Hill" thread.

I'm not quite sure anyone here can describe a black hole in a ridiculous way. Its... a hole.

Anyway, someone else, please continue.

Of course you can describe a black hole in a ridiculous way. Observe: ...except that it does not suck things into it, it removes things from the kerbal universe and inserts them into this one.

 

The building is an electric car factory... 

Edited January 23, 2016 by astrokerb

Which is lighted by candles and heated using a fireplace...

The building is a Mission Control...

...that uses smoke signals.

 

The building is a fire station...

That starts fires instead of stopping them. 

The building is a Museum...

that shows off all the websites that no longer exist.

 

The building is a lab...

...That researches trees.

This building is a hospital that...

...causes injuries instead of curing them...

The building is a vehicle assembly building...

... That builds launchpads, launching them from rockets.

The building is a music store...

...which sells videos

The new building is a pet store...
